title: [K-12] Mixed Reality (MR)-Based Design Creativity and Language Expression (Writing, Critique, Feedback) Enhancement Project

context.prior_knowledge: Basic design principles, experience with 3D modeling tools, and foundational visual/verbal communication skills (writing, presentation, feedback)
context.additional_context: Project-Based Learning environment in a hands-on classroom setting utilizing MR equipment and digital devices, emphasizing both learners' visual creativity and linguistic expressiveness (explanatory writing, design critique, peer feedback). Special focus on improving text-based communication skills.

learning_goals: Learners will improve their 3D spatial geometric analysis and design explanation writing skills in mixed reality (MR) environments by over 30%
Learners will implement creative design concepts in mixed reality environments at least three times, evaluate them through oral presentations and written critiques, and incorporate feedback
Learners will demonstrate design visualization, prototype development, and creative writing (explanatory/critical essays) competencies through MR-based PBL projects
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
